about: I am Wang Yu, a Full Stack Developer based in Singapore. I specialize in building high-performance web applications, real-time services, and smart autocomplete features using machine learning. I am passionate about modern web technologies and building seamless user experiences.

experience.description: Developed and maintained customer live chat services using WebSockets. Built smart autocomplete using ML. Developed microservices in Go on AWS with gRPC. Managed infrastructure via Terraform and Datadog.
Developed web apps for the shipping industry using Angular, RxJS, and TypeScript. Maintained the component library and wrote unit tests with Jasmine.
Developed admin portals using Angular and Spring Boot. Built batch processing systems with Spring Batch. Wrote tests using JUnit and Mockito.
Maintained licensing systems using Spring, iBATIS, and WebLogic. Researched and prototyped IoT solutions with Raspberry Pi and AWS IoT.
